name: Liminality BETA TEST
description:
The legendary trainer, Red has stopped the evils of Team Rocket, ascended to a throne of Championship, and has bested and tamed the great pokémon of the Kanto region. His latest challenge, however, threatens to be his greatest yet. Join Red as he embarks on this new journey: proposing to his boyfriend, Green.

This game is unofficial fanmade and has no relation with the actual main merchandise.
